## My first ever use of  leaflet by R markdown hosted in github

This is Rizal Park in Manila, Philippines where I came from

```{r }
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addRectangles(lat1 = 14.5800, lng1 = 120.9750, 
                lat2 = 14.5840, lng2 = 120.9815)
```
